import React, { useState } from 'react' export const AddEvent = () => { const [title,setTitle]=useState(''); const [description,setDescription]=useState(''); const [location,setLocation]=useState(''); const [maxAttendees,setMaxAttendees]=useState(''); const [registrationFees,setRegistrationFees]=useState(''); const saveEvent = (e) => {e.preventDefault(); const event={title,description,location,maxAttendees,registrationFees} } return (

Add event

{setTitle(e.target.value)}} />

{/* Location of the event text box */}
